1_open_up_the_app_you_want_to_style_like: 1. Open up the app you want to style (like Slack or Chrome).

a_powerful_new_way_to_interact_with_your: A powerful new way to interact with your text
absolutely_our_code_is_open_source_so_yo: Absolutely. Our code is open-source, so you can see for yourself. You can even choose to process your voice entirely on-device.

add_an_api_key_to_see_available_models: Add an API key to see available models
agent_mode_follows_commands_you_dictate_: Agent mode follows commands you dictate instead of just cleaning up text.
agent_mode_lets_you_give_voice_commands_: Agent Mode lets you give voice commands to write, edit, or transform text. Instead of just dictating, you can now tell the AI what you want it to do.

audio_recording_was_automatically_stoppe: Audio recording was automatically stopped due to duration limit.

audio_snapshot_unavailable_for_this_tran: Audio snapshot unavailable for this transcription.

average_words_per_minute_across_your_las: Average words per minute across your last {count, plural, one {# dictation} other {# dictations}}. Compared against a median typing speed of 40 WPM.
bagels_are_the_breakfast_of_champions: Bagels are the breakfast of champions.
be_careful_with_these_actions_they_can_h: Be careful with these actions. They can have significant consequences for your account.

by_using_voquill_you_agree_to_our: By using Voquill, you agree to our
cancel_the_current_dictation_or_agent_se: Cancel the current dictation or agent session.

Choose different writing styles to change how you sound. You can also <link>set up a hotkey</link> to switch between them faster.

choose_how_you_want_to_sound_based_on_wh: Choose how you want to sound based on what app you're using.
choose_if_voquill_should_enhance_transcr: Choose if Voquill should enhance transcripts automatically after they are transcribed.
choose_the_keyboard_shortcut_you_ll_use_: Choose the keyboard shortcut you'll use to activate Agent Mode
choose_which_microphone_voquill_should_u: Choose which microphone Voquill should use when recording. Automatic picks the best available device each time.
configure_multiple_dictation_languages_w: Configure multiple dictation languages with hotkeys.
connect_a_transcription_provider_like_gr: Connect a transcription provider like Groq with your API key.
contact_your_administrator_to_reset_your: Contact your administrator to reset your password. They can either reset your password or delete your account and have you create a new one.
control_when_the_dictation_pill_is_shown: Control when the dictation pill is shown on screen.
controls_how_much_detail_is_captured_in_: Controls how much detail is captured in diagnostic logs.
create_a_style_to_customize_how_your_voi: Create a style to customize how your voice transcriptions are formatted and refined.
cross_device_sync_voquill_cloud_and_more: Cross-device sync, Voquill Cloud, and more advanced features.
customize_your_keyboard_shortcuts_keyboa: Customize your keyboard shortcuts. Keyboard shortcuts can be triggered from within any app.
cycle_through_your_active_writing_styles: Cycle through your active writing styles.
decide_how_voquill_should_process_your_r: Decide how Voquill should process your recordings. Locally or through an API.
decide_how_voquill_should_transcribe_you: Decide how Voquill should transcribe your recordings‚Äîlocally on your machine or through a connected provider.
dictate_a_short_email_voquill_works_grea: Dictate a short email. Voquill works great for longer-form content like messages, notes, and documents.
dictate_commands_for_the_ai_to_follow_in: Dictate commands for the AI to follow instead of just cleaning up text.
dictate_text_into_3_different_applicatio: Dictate text into 3 different applications. Voquill will detect each app automatically.
different_applications_use_different_key: Different applications use different keyboard shortcuts for pasting. Select the keybind that works best for this app.
do_the_waves_respond_to_your_voice: Do the waves respond to your voice?
does_the_key_light_up_green_when_pressed: Does the key light up green when pressed?

enter_your_email_and_we_ll_send_a_reset_: Enter your email and we'll send a reset link.
export_diagnostic_logs_as_a_text_file_fo: Export diagnostic logs as a text file for troubleshooting.
go_to_the_styles_page_and_choose_a_writi: Go to the Styles page and choose a writing style to change how your dictation sounds.
how_does_the_voice_activation_work: How does the voice activation work?
how_voquill_should_manage_your_transcrip: How Voquill should manage your transcriptions.
if_enabled_words_dictated_in_incognito_m: If enabled, words dictated in incognito mode will still count toward your usage statistics.

leave_empty_to_use_the_default_url: Leave empty to use the default URL
lets_you_trigger_dictation_hotkeys_while: Lets you trigger dictation hotkeys while using other applications.
local_set_up_is_complicated_and_requires: Local set up is complicated and requires a strong technical background. We recommend the free plan for most users.

name: Name
no_ai_post_processing_will_run_on_new_tr: No AI post-processing will run on new transcripts.
no_apps_registered_yet_start_dictating_i: No apps registered yet. Start dictating in an app and it will appear here.
no_downloads_or_manual_setup_record_on_a: No downloads or manual setup. Record on any device and we'll keep your data secure, synced, and ready everywhere.
one_week_on_us_no_payment_info_required: One week on us. No payment info required.
only_active_for_the_duration_of_this_ses: Only active for the duration of this session.
only_needed_if_your_instance_requires_au: Only needed if your instance requires authentication

play_a_sound_when_you_start_or_stop_reco: Play a sound when you start or stop recording.
please_restart_the_application_for_the_n: Please restart the application for the new permissions to take effect.
post_processing_must_be_enabled_to_use_w: Post-processing must be enabled to use writing styles.
press_and_hold_your_hotkey_then_start_ta: Press and hold your hotkey, then start talking. When you release the key, your speech will be converted to text.
press_hotkeys_and_say_something_like_wri: Press {hotkeys} and say something like 'Write an email to Bob about his shoes'.
press_one_of_hotkeys_to_dictate_anywhere: Press one of {hotkeys} to dictate anywhere.

press_your_hotkey_combo_then_release: Press your hotkey combo, then release

remove_access_to_all_premium_features: Remove access to all premium features
removing_the_key_signs_you_out_of_that_p: Removing the key signs you out of that provider on this device.
reset_link_will_be_sent_to_email: Reset link will be sent to: {email}
run_it_multiple_times_to_refine_your_tex: Run it multiple times to refine your text until it's perfect.
say_something_and_watch_the_waves_respon: Say something and watch the waves respond to your voice.
select_which_ai_provider_to_use_for_agen: Select which AI provider to use for Agent Mode
set_preferred_providers_in_order_of_prio: Set preferred providers in order of priority
set_up_multiple_languages_with_different: Set up multiple languages with different hotkeys
simply_click_the_microphone_bubble_that_: Simply click the microphone bubble that appears in any text input field. Start speaking and watch as your voice is converted to text in real-time.
some_hotkeys_share_overlapping_keys_whic: Some hotkeys share overlapping keys, which may cause conflicts.
start_a_short_test_to_see_live_audio_lev: Start a short test to see live audio levels and play back what was recorded.

tell_voquill_how_to_enhance_your_transcr: Tell Voquill how to enhance your transcripts after they are created.
test_out_agent_mode_right_now: Test out Agent Mode right now
the_current_transcription_session_has_be: The current transcription session has been cancelled. You can change the hotkey for this in settings.
the_recommendedkey_key_works_great_for_m: The {recommendedKey} key works great for most users.
the_user_has_dictated_the_following_comm: The user has dictated the following command: ------- {transcript} ------- Execute this command and provide the output in {languageName}. Instructions: - If the user asks you to write, create, draft, or compose something ‚Üí produce that content - If the user asks you to summarize, analyze, or explain something ‚Üí provide the summary/analysis/explanation - If the user asks you to transform or rewrite something ‚Üí apply the transformation - If the user provides a statement without a clear command ‚Üí clean it up and present it clearly Return ONLY the requested output, nothing else. The output will be pasted directly into the user's application.
this_action_cannot_be_undone_all_your_da: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
this_action_permanently_removes_local_da: This action permanently removes local data
this_information_helps_personalize_your_: This information helps personalize your experience.

this_style_is_managed_by_your_organizati: This style is managed by your organization.
this_term_is_managed_by_your_organizatio: This term is managed by your organization.
this_will_delete_all_preferences_diction: This will delete all preferences, dictionary entries, and saved transcriptions from this device. The action cannot be undone.
tip_choose_a_stronger_model_for_better_r: Tip: Choose a stronger model for better results. Smaller or weaker models may produce lower quality output.
tip_run_agent_mode_multiple_times_to_kee: Tip: Run Agent Mode multiple times to keep refining! It remembers what's in the text box.
title: Title

to_connect_you_need_your_b_gateway_url_b:
To connect, you need your gateway URL and token.
  • Gateway URL is ws://localhost:18789 by default.
  • To find your token, run: openclaw config get gateway.auth.token
tonename_is_your_only_active_style_add_m: "{toneName}" is your only active style. Add more styles from the writing styles menu.
try_commands_like_write_an_email_to_bob_: Try commands like 'Write an email to Bob about the meeting' or 'Make this paragraph more formal'. Agent Mode reads what's in your text field and rewrites it based on your instructions.
try_saying_write_an_email_to_bob_about_h: Try saying "Write an email to Bob about his shoes" or "Make this more casual"
unable_to_connect_to_ollama_at_the_speci: Unable to connect to Ollama at the specified URL.
unable_to_fetch_models_from_groq: Unable to fetch models from Groq.
upgrade_now_to_continue_voice_typing_wit: Upgrade now to continue voice typing without any limits.

use_other_providers_if_preferred_ones_ar: Use other providers if preferred ones are unavailable
use_the_new_cloud_backend_for_transcript: Use the new cloud backend for transcription and text generation. Requires cloud mode to be enabled.
used_to_sign_things_like_emails_and_stuf: Used to sign things like emails and stuff
voquill_is_an_ai_dictation_tool_it_needs: Voquill is an AI dictation tool. It needs microphone and accessibility access in order to function properly.
voquill_may_misunderstand_you_on_occasio: Voquill may misunderstand you on occasion. If you see certain words being missed frequently, you can define a replacement rule here to fix the spelling automatically.
voquill_needs_accessibility_permissions_: Voquill needs accessibility permissions to paste transcriptions into focused text fields.
voquill_only_activates_your_microphone_w: Voquill only activates your microphone when you choose to start recording.
voquill_works_on_virtually_any_website_w: Voquill works on virtually any website with text input fields - email clients, social media, forms, documents, and more.
we_couldn_t_load_your_saved_api_keys_ple: We couldn't load your saved API keys. Please try again.
we_ll_send_a_password_reset_link_to_your: We'll send a password reset link to your email address. Click the link in the email to create a new password.
what_websites_does_it_work_on: What websites does it work on?
when_enabled_voquill_will_not_save_trans: When enabled, Voquill will not save transcription history or audio snapshots.
whisper_model_id_available_in_your_speac: Whisper model ID available in your Speaches instance
you_cannot_start_a_microphone_test_while: You cannot start a microphone test while a transcription is in progress.
you_re_currently_on_version_version_the_: You're currently on version {version}. The app will restart after the update finishes.
you_ve_used_all_your_free_words_for_toda: You've used all your free words for today.
